name: There was a stranger at the door
name_original: There was a stranger at the door
description:
Someone comes to your door late at night.  What will you do? Will you survive the encounter?

This game was made for the  Spooktober 2nd Annual Visual Novel Jam. It may be updated after the jam is over.

Thank you Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) and  David Fesliyan (fesliyanstudios.com) for the background music.  Sounds were provided by SoundBible.com.

**Warning: this game contains descriptions of violence and murder. **
